```{r}
#| label: setup
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
```

```{r}
flights <- flights
```

```{r}
dim(flights)[1]
```

```{r}
class(flights)
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false |>
flights |>
  head(n = 10)
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false |>
flights |>
  arrange(desc(month), desc(day))
```

```{r}
flights <- flights |>
  arrange(month, day, desc(dep_time))
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false |>
flights |>
  tail()
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false |>
flights |>
  filter(month == 1, day == 1) |>
  print(
  n = 5, 
  width = 70
  )
```

```{r}
summary(flights)
```

```{r}
  flights %>% 
  filter(month == 1, day %in% c(1, 15, 30)) %>% 
  slice_tail(n = 7) %>% 
  print(width = 70)
```
